snippet: The goalless draw between the top-of-the-table La Liga teams was anything but guileless. But since the third-place team is Real, Atlético gets the real credit.
lead_paragraph: The goalless draw between the top-of-the-table La Liga teams was anything but guileless. But since the third-place team is Real, Atlético gets the real credit.

headline.main: Little Separates Barcelona From Atlético Madrid
headline.print_headline: Little Separates Barcelona From Atlético Madrid
